ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set includes concepts that identify current non-use of tobacco products in general, as opposed to non-use of specific forms of tobacco. This includes never users and ex-users of tobacco products.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to be used for the attribute of result. Using the Quality Data Model, the attribute of result is used for this datatype: "Risk Category Assessment: Screening for Tobacco Use in Prior 30 days"),(Inclusion Criteria: Patients who have either never used tobacco or are ex-tobacco users should be included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: "Users of any type of tobacco (cigarettes, cigars, pipe tobacco, chewing tobacco, dry and moist snuff, snus)Non-users of specific forms of tobacco (e.g. ex-cigar smoker, never chewed tobacco)")
